cast.overview: A boy is given the ability to become an adult superhero in times of need with a single magic word.
cast.title: Shazam!

details.biography: Wayne has acted in over 30 Professional stage and television productions and has toured nationally. He has also co-authored, adapted, produced and directed numerous professional productions. His acting resume runs from commercial on-camera Spokesman and voice-over work to Principal roles in series such Hawaii 5-0, Vega$, Magnum P.I., The Jeffersons and Jake and The Fatman. He obtained his BA in Theatre with honors from San Jose State University and is trained in classical and modern theatre, and in television and film.
details.name: Wayne Ward
